mapper.update:
update ADDRESS
PARTNER_ID = #{partnerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LOCATION_ID = #{locationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CIRCLE_ID = #{circleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(ID) from ADDRESS where DELETED = 0
